Brave3d.overStage (/unique_chucks/10/0x132e2b67e91bf0294536b16d772e8dee099fc40c.sol#311-374) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- block.number == finishStage.blocknumber

Brave3d.overStage (/unique_chucks/10/0x132e2b67e91bf0294536b16d772e8dee099fc40c.sol#311-374) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- block.number == finishStage.blocknumber
Brave3d.resetStage (/unique_chucks/10/0x132e2b67e91bf0294536b16d772e8dee099fc40c.sol#374-378) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _stageMap[rate][curStageIndex - 1].cnt == MAX_PLAYERS

Brave3d.overStage (/unique_chucks/10/0x132e2b67e91bf0294536b16d772e8dee099fc40c.sol#311-374) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-p3dContract.buy.value(P3D_VALUE * rate)(address(OFFICIAL_P3D)) (/unique_chucks/10/0x132e2b67e91bf0294536b16d772e8dee099fc40c.sol#358-360)
